artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō; Printer: Ono Gintarō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; green, brown and yellow fields and foliage in foreground; mountains in background; L2001.372.193 is identical image
inscription: 伊豆八景之内　早春の吉田 {Izu hakkei no uchi, Sōshun no Yoshida} (The Eight Views of Izu, Early Spring at Yoshida)
markings: hand-applied red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | LR, publisher seal: 渡辺木版美術画舖工作 {Watanabe mokuhan bijutsu gaho kōsaku} (produced by Watanabe woodblock print art store) | LR, printer seal: 摺師　斧銀太郎 {surishi Ono Gintarō} (printer Ono Gintarō)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Izu (Izu hakkei no uchi 伊豆八景之内)
text: In The Eight Views of Izu, Shinsui focused on scenes in the former Izu Province, located on the Izu peninsula, in present-day Shizuoka Prefecture. Izu is a popular resort region with famous beaches and many hot springs.
title: Early Spring at Yoshida
